title: I LOVE Dragon Sorceress Zyra, BUT...
body:
Hi,
I'm VERY dedicated Zyra main practically since I started playing (the end of season 4). Since then, I was waiting for a new skin for my love. I was so hyped up when I saw the teaser. Now that we can see the preview, I must say, I love the spell effects and model, except ONE thing:

https://youtu.be/QkK19myCFPQ?nodirect

**Does she really need to have those wings on her ass?**

Like... It looks like she was from some kind of a bad anime solely because of that! I don't know who came up with this anatomic bullshit, but it is absolutely contrary to anything esthetic. PLEASE, consider putting them on her back/shoulders normally, even if it takes one more patch, I'll gladly wait, I managed to wait for two and half a year!

Thank you for reading this,
Passionate player and infinite Zyra lover
*Sexy Bisex Plant*

Edit: I see, all of you guys agree in comments, please, upvote this post also so Rioters can see it, thank you! <3

replies.body: Hi! I wanted to drop in with a bit of context here - you're right in that they're not anatomically correct, and that was done purposefully. In the case of Dragon Sorceress Zyra, we took a bit of creative freedom, and made something that was a bit more outside the box in terms of design, and in return, sacrificed practicality.
Why does her recall look so similar to demon vi's?

While I do see what you mean regarding Demon Vi, they both utilize wings, so there will be some overlap. We added a recall winddown for Dragon Sorceress Zyra, which, in my opinion, really divides the two.

Given that I'm an idiot, could you explain what a recall winddown is?

Also, just looking at them, both features them sprouting wings, slamming a fist into the ground, then flying up into the air.

Nah, you aren't an idiot. It's basically what plays right after the recall, once the champion is back in the spawn pool. So, instead of returning to an idle stance, she flies down and lands in the spawn pool.

Ah, okey doke. Didn't know that, thank you for clearing that up.

But the main part of the recall is, in terms of movement and wings and stuff, rather similar. I know it's not my place, but I feel like some more could have been done to make it stand out.

Yeah, of course. It's a weird term, and something that people just think is a part of the recall most of the time, haha. 

Unfortunately, we aren't going to make adjustments to the recall. Something like this can take up to two weeks to create and adjust, and that doesn't include testing. ;_; I do appreciate the candid feedback, and I 100% believe that this is something we should keep in mind for future skin recalls.

I forgot how much work goes into making the animations, sorry ;_;

But yeah, I'm sure that in the future the recalls will be even more diverse than now. Keep up the good work, whoever does the animations!
It's all good, no need to apologize. :)

I will apologize because it's all i know how to do >:3

Joking, joking. Thanks again for the clarification, and I hope that work goes smoothly!

Hi, thanks for clarification :) What about the colour scheme, are you going to adjust it? Not that I don't like it but I prefer the teaser colour scheme more and to be honest the lack of green/turquoise dissapointed me a little bit and if colours were more bright, they would match with spell-effects more.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

You're welcome! At this point, we won't be adjusting the color scheme. I think the misalignment between the teaser and the skin is, the egg in the teaser is in a cave (so the lighting is different), and the blue around it is the particle effect that lives around the egg in game. This is actually really good feedback in terms of teaser v. game models, simply because lighting can be a throw off in a lot of cases. ;_;
Yeah, as an artist myself I completely understand that <3 Just telling how I (and many other people as we could see) view it :)
I appreciate it! :)
Any chance the color palate will be changed? Looks very Void-like at a glance...

I love the wings and I'm glad you guys are thinking outside of the box. When I first saw it, it reminds me of Morrigan who often have her wings on her waist.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/darkstalkers/images/6/63/Darkstalkers_Resurrection_Morrigan.png/revision/latest?cb=20121122175731
Ye, it reminded me of this character, too... And I don't like it... But I guess I'm going to need to get used to it :')
if she would look like that, i would buy her lul

so .. ass wings aren't practical?

if she can fly with them, its kidda practical already isn't it?

I completely agree on the buttwings, they'd be perfect if they were actually in the right spot. Also kinda disappointed in how different the eggs look from the teaser. The scaled texture was wicked imo.

Pretty agreed there... A was also expecting more green-purple color scheme from that teaser and the model looks pretty dull compared to spells, but I'm pretty sure they're gonna fix it sooner or later.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hPySFLb2cIU/WK3UVTsYr1I/AAAAAAAAeTM/XTrj0E-yLxcSSYCzVKHk2PYu6DDZIs1YgCLcB/s200/12.jpg

Yeah it does look really weird lol 

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WxiEOw6YPcM/WK3UVzJ38aI/AAAAAAAAeTo/aAuhF2C9FgIG6a7kEUrQtgvTAt-TNuCqACLcB/s1600/9.jpg

The look of this plant makes me wanna buy it, and I don't even play the champion :l
It's absolutely gorgeous, it's only the wings that strike it down (pun intended, noone would be able to fly like this).
i saw it and was like "the ass wing army grows!"{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I see this in anime from time to time.  It bothers me less than it used to.  Still not right though.
I think the wings wouldn't be out of place if they came out form her shoulders instead of the lower back. And a bit ethereal like the little things around her wrists.
Totally.
But it draws attention!

Good one xD

But(t) no, she doesn't need that, it already distracts me from the gameplay enough xD

You can never have enough attention. 

But real talk though, enough with being creepy, the bum or hips, is a rather odd place for wings.

replies.poster: x R U K A x
replies.body: I actually love the wings and think they would honestly look weird if they were on her back/shoulders, not to mention if they were put there I feel that a lot of people would mistake this for a Morgana skin. Side note, the wings kind of make her hips look bigger and I'm all for that.
That's like saying people would mistake Demon Vi for a Morgana skin...

replies.poster: x R U K A x
replies.body: I mean, Zyra and Morgana do have similar appearances what with them both being skinny, big boobed, long hair, and pointy ears.
Zyra does not have pointy ears, those are leafes, plus Morg has her skirt.
the wings on her ass look better than all her abilities tbh.
Are you saying her abilities look bad or the wings look good?

Imho her wings look very good - even near her butt. I dont like her abilities: The "only-purple" for a dragon-themed skin looks weird. Her W looks bland. Her E looks weird. Her Ult looks lame. And her plants... the range-one looks "ok", but the melee-one looks dumb af.


Hope now u understood me and maybe i enlightened u. ;)

EDIT: btw will comment ure thread soon too.
The reason for the purple is because purple is seen as a regal color, adn dragons are regal creatures.
blue and crimson too :)

I love the wings, reminds me of Morrigan who have her wings on her waist too.

http://orig13.deviantart.net/753a/f/2007/112/d/9/morrigan_by_artgerm.jpg

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/darkstalkers/images/2/22/Capcom_vs_SNK_2_Morrigan_02.png/revision/latest?cb=20110807190717

http://dh101.humanities.ucla.edu/DH101Fall12Lab4/archive/files/8794064eed9dcd717269aaa043629a26.jpg

Ugh...
Noh8
